actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to raise the limit on the principal amount of a mortgage which may be insured under section 203 of the National Housing Act with respect to single-family residences in high-cost areas.

summary.text: Amends the National Housing Act to raise the limit on the principal amount of a mortgage which may be insured under such Act as regards single- family residences in high-cost areas.

titles.title: A bill to raise the limit on the principal amount of a mortgage which may be insured under section 203 of the National Housing Act with respect to single-family residences in high-cost areas.
